testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: 1. Set interface eth0 mode wan 2. Establish a tunnel between BR eth0 and CVG
Test Procedure: 1. Create user-profile up1 2. Set match-map from up1 to vpn network and to internet Routing match-map ma user-profile up1 to private Routing match-map mb user-profile up1 to any 3. Set a route-map, to vpn network traffic via tunnel interface on eth0, and to internet traffic via eth0 interface routing route-map ra via encrypted routing route-map rb via eth0 4. Bind match-map to routing policy routing policy pa id 1 match-map ma route-map ra routing policy pb id 2 match-map mb route-map ra 5. Laptop connect to the user-profile up1 6. Laptop send traffic to vpn network, check result1 7. Laptop send traffic to internet, check result2 8. Laptop not connect to the user-profile up1 9. Laptop send traffic to vpn network, check result3 10. Laptop send traffic to internet, check result3

step.desc: config mgt0.1 and mgt0.2 with dhcp service enable,dns service enable
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.1 vlan ${br1.vlan1}" -v "interface mgt0.1 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options dns1 ${pub.dns1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable" -v "interface mgt0.4 vlan ${br1.vpc4.vlan}" -v "interface mgt0.4 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.4.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "interface mgt0.4 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.4.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.4.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface mgt0.4 dhcp-server options netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "interface mgt0.4 dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.4.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.4 dhcp-server options dns1 ${pub.dns1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.4 dhcp-server enable" -v "routing internal-sub-network ${br1.br.mgt0.4.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}"

step.desc: Create user-profile bind eth1 and eth4
step.telnet: -v "interface eth1 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 1" -v "interface eth1 mac-learning enable" -v "security-object lan1" -v "security-object lan1 default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "interface eth1 security-object lan1" -v "user-profile fw qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${br1.vlan1} attribute 1" -v "user-profile fw4 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${br1.vpc4.vlan} attribute 4" -v "interface eth4 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 4" -v "interface eth4 mac-learning enable"

step.desc: Set match-map from fw to vpn network and to internet Set a route-map, to vpn network traffic via tunnel interface on eth0, and to internet traffic via eth0 interface Bind match-map to routing policy
step.telnet: -v "Routing match-map ma user-profile fw to private" -v "Routing match-map mb user-profile fw to any" -v "routing route-map ra via encrypted" -v "routing route-map rb via eth0" -v "routing policy pa id 1 match-map ma route-map ra" -v "routing policy pb id 2 match-map mb route-map rb"

step.desc: Laptop connect to the user-profile fw
get raw mac of vpc1
get mac of br1.vpc1
set br1.vpc1.tif.ip var for vpc1 on BR side
show ip rule
open debug switch
step.telnet: -v "_ff id 1 src-ip ${br1.vpc1.tif.ip} bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "clear log buffered"

step.desc: Laptop send traffic to vpn network,ping is successful
show logging buffered,the ping traffic to vpn network are forwarded on tunnel0,match the routing policy pa
Laptop send traffic to internet,ping is successful
show logging buffered on br ,the ping traafic is forwarded on eth0,match the routing policy pb
Laptop not connect to the user-profile fw
get raw mac of vpc4
get mac of br1.vpc4
set br1.vpc4.tif.ip var for vpc4 on BR side
open debug switch
step.telnet: -v "no _ff id 1" -v "_ff id 1 src-ip ${br1.vpc4.tif.ip} bidirectional" -v "clear log buffer"

step.desc: Laptop(br1.vpc4) send traffic to vpn network,ping is successful
show logging buffered on br ,ping traffic is forwarded on tunnel0 base on the main route table
Laptop send traffic to internet
show logging buffered,ping traffic is forwarded on eth0 base on the main route table
